body:
Known mostly for his still-lifes, little is known of Abberly's life or training.  He often combined an

outdoor still-life of apples or corn with a squirrel for delightfully charming compositions.  Abberly

exhibited at the National Academy of Design, New York City.

Additional Information for Elias Abberley
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 11.5 x 15.5 inches / Signed lower left
metaDescription: Known mostly for his still-lifes, little is known of Abberly's life or training. He often combined an outdoor still-life of apples or corn with a squirrel for deli
metaTitle: Elias Abberly Painting - Delightful Find - 19th Century American Fine Art
title: Delightful Find
